Shell

Installation

  1. Install dash if not already installed:

    # pacman -S --needed dash

  2. Install zsh if not already installed:

    # pacman -S --needed zsh zsh-autosuggestions zsh-completions zsh-syntax-highlighting

Configuration

  1. Configure dash as default system shell:

    # ln -sf $(command -vp dash) /bin/sh

  2. Configure zsh as login shell for user:

    $ chsh -s /bin/zsh
> <USER-PASSWORD>
